com.persistit

Class TaskCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.persistit.Task
      • com.persistit.TaskCheck
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class TaskCheck
extends Task
    A Task which simply checks the status of another Task. The CLI can invoke this to poll for completion of a long-running task such as IntegrityCheck.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.persistit.Task
